title: Enhancing Leadership Practical Competencies: Instructional Design and Ethical Applications of Technology: Reflective Practice and Critical Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain ethical issues through analysis of real-world language education design cases.
Learners can make decisions in ethical dilemmas using reflection-in-action techniques.
Learners can creatively propose alternative educational designs by applying critical design methodologies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
